title: To Be or Not to Be
creator_credit: Ernst Lubitsch, Alexander Korda and United Artists Corporation
brief_description: A Warsaw theatre group, before and during the Nazi invasion, wages war on Hitler on a devious new battleground - the Shakespearean stage. The actors improvise an underground plot and an impersonation of invading Nazis, including Adolf Hitler. Stars Jack Benny, Robert Stack and Carole Lombard in her final performance.
